articles.content:

articles.title: Over 250 people quarantined in South Carolina as measles outbreak rages - Ars Technica
articles.description: 16 cases are linked to a church, which followed exposures at four schools last week.

Google will launch its first AI glasses in 2026, according to a company blog post.
